general.title: Teamspaces unlock better organization and tracking in Plane.
general.description: Create a dedicated surface for every real-world team, separate from all other work surfaces in Plane, and customize them to suit how your team works.

no_teamspaces.title: You haven’t linked any teamspaces yet.
no_teamspaces.description: Teamspace and project owners can manage access to projects.

confirm.title: Remove {teamspaceName} from {projectName}
confirm.description: When you remove this teamspace from a linked project, members here will lose access to the linked project.

success.title: {count, plural, one {You linked a teamspace to this project.} other {You linked # teamspaces to this project.}}
success.description: {additionalCount, plural, =0 {Teamspace {firstTeamspaceName} is now linked to this project.} other {Teamspace {firstTeamspaceName} and {additionalCount} more are now linked to this project.}}

error.title: That didn’t go through.
error.description: Try that again or reload this page before trying again.

success.title: You removed that teamspace from this project.

error.title: That didn’t go through.
error.description: Try that again or reload this page before trying again.

info.title: Adding a teamspace grants all teamspace members access to this project.

no_teamspaces.title: You don’t have any teamspaces to link.
no_teamspaces.description: Either you aren’t in a teamspace that you can link or you have already linked all available teamspaces.

no_results.title: That doesn’t match any of your teamspaces.
no_results.description: Try another term or make sure you have teamspaces to link.

no_work_items.title: Create team-specific work items.
no_work_items.description: Work items that are assigned to members of this team in any linked project will automatically show up here. If you expect to see some work items here, make sure your linked projects have work items assigned to members of this team or create work items.

primary_button.text: Add work items to a linked project

work_items_empty_filter.title: There are no team-specific work items for the filters applied
work_items_empty_filter.description: Change some of those filters or clear them all to see work items relevant to this space.

current.title: None of your linked projects have an active cycle.
current.description: Active cycles in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see an active cycle, make sure it is running in a linked project right now.

completed.title: None of your linked projects have a completed cycle.
completed.description: Completed cycles in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see a completed cycle, make sure it is also completed in a linked project.

upcoming.title: None of your linked projects have an upcoming cycle.
upcoming.description: Upcoming cycles in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see an upcoming cycle, make sure it is there in a linked project, too.

team_view.title: Your team's views of your work without disrupting any other views in your workspace
team_view.description: See your team's work in views that are saved just for your team and separately from a project's views.

filter.title: No matching views
filter.description:
No views match the search criteria. 
 Create a new view instead.

team_page.title: House your team's knowledge in Team Pages.
team_page.description: Unlike pages in a project, you can save knowledge specific to a team in a separate set of pages here. Get all the features of Pages, create best practices docs, and team wikis easily.

filter.title: No matching pages
filter.description: Remove the filters to see all pages

search.title: No matching pages
search.description: Remove the search criteria to see all pages

progress.title: None of your linked projects have published work items.
progress.description: Create some work items in one or more of those projects to see progress by dates, states, and priority.

blocking.title: You don't have any work items blocking a teammate.
blocking.description: Good job! You have cleared the path for your team. You are a good team player.

blocked.title: You don't have any teammate's work items blocking you.
blocked.description: Good news! You can make progress on all your assigned work items.

general.title: None of your linked projects have published work items.
general.description: Create some work items in one or more of those projects to see distribution of work by project and team members.

filter.title: There are no team stats for the filters applied.
filter.description: Create some work items in one or more of those projects to see distribution of work by project and team members.

general.title: Organize work at the highest level with Initiatives
general.description: When you need to organize work spanning several projects and teams, Initiatives come in handy. Connect projects and epics to initiatives, see automatically rolled up updates, and see the forests before you get to the trees.

search.title: No matching initiatives
search.description:
No initiatives detected with the matching criteria. 
 Create a new initiative instead.

not_found.title: Initiative does not exist
not_found.description: The Initiative you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

epics.title: You don't have epics that match the filters you have applied.
epics.subHeading: To see all epics, clear all applied filters.

empty_state.title: No scope added to this initiative yet
empty_state.description: Link projects and epics and track that work in this space.

general.title: Write a note, a doc, or a full knowledge base. Get Galileo, Plane's AI assistant, to help you get started
general.description: Pages are thoughts potting space in Plane. Take down meeting notes, format them easily, embed work items, lay them out using a library of components, and keep them all in your project's context. To make short work of any doc, invoke Galileo, Plane's AI, with a shortcut or the click of a button.

private.title: No private pages yet
private.description: Keep your private thoughts here. When you're ready to share, the team's just a click away.

public.title: No public pages yet
public.description: See pages shared with everyone in your workspace right here.

archived.title: No archived pages yet
archived.description: Archive pages not on your radar. Access them here when needed.

shared.title: No shared pages yet
shared.description: Pages that others have shared with you will appear here.

cycle_progress.title: No data yet
cycle_progress.description: Cycle progress analytics will appear here. Add work items to cycles to start tracking progress.

module_progress.title: No data yet
module_progress.description: Module progress analytics will appear here. Add work items to modules to start tracking progress.

intake_trends.title: No data yet
intake_trends.description: Intake trends analytics will appear here. Add work items to intake to start tracking trends.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Jira data. Once the project is created, select it here.

steps.description_import_users: Please add the users you wish to migrate from Jira to Plane. Alternatively, you can skip this step and manually add users later.
steps.description_map_states: We have automatically matched the Jira statuses to Plane states to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining states before proceeding, you can also create states and map them manually.
steps.description_map_priorities: We have automatically matched the priorities to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining priorities before proceeding.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from Jira to Plane.

upload.upload_complete_description: Click "Start Import" to begin processing your Notion data.

linear_importer.linear_importer_description: Import your Linear data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Linear data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_linear: Please select the Linear team from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_map_states: We have automatically matched the Linear statuses to Plane states to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining states before proceeding, you can also create states and map them manually.
steps.description_map_priorities: Please select the Linear priorities which you want to map to Plane project priorities.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from Linear to Plane.

jira_server_importer.jira_server_importer_description: Import your Jira Server data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Jira data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_jira: Please select the Jira workspace from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_map_states: Please select the Jira states which you want to map to Plane project statuses.
steps.description_map_priorities: Please select the Jira priorities which you want to map to Plane project priorities.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from Jira to Plane.

flatfile_importer.flatfile_importer_description: Import your CSV data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your CSV data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_csv: Please upload your CSV file and configure the fields to be mapped to Plane fields.

clickup_importer.clickup_importer_description: Import your ClickUp data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your ClickUp data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_clickup: Please select the ClickUp team, space and folder from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_map_states: We have automatically matched the ClickUp statuses to Plane states to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining states before proceeding, you can also create states and map them manually.
steps.description_map_priorities: Please select the ClickUp priorities which you want to map to Plane project priorities.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from ClickUp to Plane.

not_configured_state.ask_admin: Ask your admin to configure this widget.

upgrade_required.title: This widget type isn't included in your plan.

title.label: Name your dashboard.
title.placeholder: "Capacity across projects", "Workload by team", "State across all projects"

project.label: Choose projects
project.placeholder: Data from these projects will power this dashboard.

feature_flag.title: Present your progress in on-demand, forever dashboards.
feature_flag.description: Build any dashboard you need to and customize how your data looks for the perfect presentation of your progress.
feature_flag.coming_soon_to_mobile: Coming soon to the mobile app

card_1.title: For all your projects
card_1.description: Get a total god-view of your workspace with all your projects or slice your work data for that perfect view your progress.

card_2.title: For any data in Plane
card_2.description: Go beyond out-of-the-box Analytics and readymade Cycle charts to look at teams', initiatives, or anything else like you haven't before.

card_3.title: For all your data viz needs
card_3.description: Choose from several customizable charts with fine-grained controls to see and show your work data exactly how you want to.

card_4.title: On-demand and permanent
card_4.description: Build once, keep forever with automatic refreshes of your data, contextual flags for scope changes, and shareable permalinks.

card_5.title: Exports and scheduled comms
card_5.description: For those times when links don't work, get your dashboards out into one-time PDFs or schedule them to be sent to stakeholders automatically.

card_6.title: Auto-laid out for all devices
card_6.description: Resize your widgets for the layout you want and see it the exact same across mobile, tablet, and other browsers.

dashboards_list.title: Visualize data in widgets, build your dashboards with widgets, and see the latest on demand.
dashboards_list.description: Build your dashboards with Custom Widgets that show your data in the scope you specify. Get dashboards for all your work across projects and teams and share permalinks with stakeholders for on-demand tracking.

dashboards_search.title: That doesn't match a dashboard's name.
dashboards_search.description: Make sure your query is right or try another query.

widgets_list.title: Visualize your data how you want to.
widgets_list.description:
Use lines, bars, pies, and other formats to see your data
the way you want to from the sources you specify.

widget_data.title: Nothing to see here
widget_data.description: Refresh or add data to see it here.

workflow_states.work_item_creation_disable_tooltip: Work item creation is disabled for this state
workflow_states.default_state: Default state lets all members create new work items. This can't be changed
workflow_states.state_change_count: {count, plural, one {1 permitted state change} other {{count} permitted state changes}}
workflow_states.movers_count: {count, plural, one {1 listed reviewer} other {{count} listed reviewers}}

movers.label: When reviewed by
movers.tooltip: Reviewers are people who are permitted to move work items from one state to another.

workflow_disabled.title: You can't move this work item here.

upgrade.title: Control the chaos of changes and reviews with Workflows.
upgrade.description: Set rules for where your work moves, by who, and when with Workflows in Plane.

reset_workflow.title: Are you sure you want to reset this workflow?
reset_workflow.description: If you reset this workflow, all your state-change rules will be deleted and you will have to create them again to run them for this project.

delete_state_change.title: Are you sure you want to delete this state-change rule?
delete_state_change.description: Once deleted, you can't undo this change and you will have to set the rule again if you want it running for this project.

error.title: Error
error.message: Workflow could not be {action}. Please try again.

error.title: Error resetting workflow
error.message: Workflow could not be reset. Please try again.

error.title: Error adding state change rule
error.message: State change rule could not be added. Please try again.

error.title: Error modifying state change rule
error.message: State change rule could not be modified. Please try again.

error.title: Error removing state change rule
error.message: State change rule could not be removed. Please try again.

error.title: Error modifying state change rule reviewers
error.message: State change rule reviewers could not be modified. Please try again.

upgrade.title: Prioritize and manage work with Customers.
upgrade.description: Map your work to customers and prioritize by customer attributes.

customer_name.name: Customer name
customer_name.placeholder: This could be name of the person or business

validation.max_length: Customer name cannot be more than 255 characters.

website_url.name: Website
website_url.placeholder: Any URL with https:// will work.

employees.name: Employees
employees.placeholder: Number of employees if your customer is a business.

revenue.name: Revenue
revenue.placeholder: This is the revenue your customer generates annually.

custom.title: Custom properties
custom.info: Add your customers' unique attributes to Plane so you can manage work items or customer records better.

empty_state.title: You don't have any custom properties yet.
empty_state.description: Custom properties that you'd like to see in work items, elsewhere in Plane,or outside Plane in a CRM or another tool, will show up here when you add them.

detail.title: We couldn't find that customer record.
detail.description: The link to this record could be wrong or this record could have been deleted.

search.title: You don't seem to have customer records matching that term.
search.description: Try with another search term or reach out to us if you are sure you should see results for that term.

list.title: Manage your work's volume, cadence, and flow by what's important to your customers.
list.description: With Customers, a Plane-only feature, you can now create new customers from scratch and connect them to your work. Soon,  you will bring them over from other tools along with their custom attributes that matter to you.

settings.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this page.
settings.description: Track and manage customer relationships in your workflow.

delete.description: All data associated with this record will be deleted permanently. You can't restore this record later.

upgrade.title: Templates
upgrade.description: With project, work-item, and page templates in Plane, you don't have to create a project from scratch or set work item props manually.
upgrade.sub_description: Get 80% of your admin time back when you use Templates.

no_labels.description: No labels yet. Create labels to help organize and filter work items in you project.

no_work_items.description: No work items yet. Add one to structure your work better.

no_sub_work_items.description: No sub-work items yet. Add one to structure your work better.

no_templates.title: There are no templates you have access to.

success.title: Template created
success.message: {templateName}, the {templateType} template, is now available for your workspace.

error.title: We couldn't create that template this time.
error.message: Try saving your details again or copy them over to a new template, preferably in another tab.

error.title: We couldn't save changes to this template.
error.message: Try saving your details again or come back to this template later. If there's trouble still, reach out to us.

success.title: Template deleted
success.message: {templateName}, the {templateType} template, has now been deleted from your workspace.

error.title: We couldn't delete that template this.
error.message: Try deleting it again or come back to it later. If you can't delete it then, reach out to us.

success.title: Template unpublished
success.message: {templateName}, the {templateType} template, has now been unpublished.

error.title: We couldn't unpublish that template this.
error.message: Try unpublishing it again or come back to it later. If you can't unpublish it then, reach out to us.

description.prefix: Are you sure you want to delete template-
description.suffix: ? All of the data related to the template will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.

description.prefix: Are you sure you want to unpublish template-
description.suffix: ? This template will no longer be available to users on the marketplace.

create.title: Create a work item
create.sub-title: Let the team know what you would like them to work on.
create.name: Name
create.description_placeholder: Add as much detail as you'd like to help the team identify your exact situation and needs.

errors.name: Name is required
errors.name_max_length: Name should be less than 255 characters
errors.title: Title is required
errors.title_max_length: Title should be less than 255 characters

success.title: Yay! Your work item is now in the team's queue.
success.description: The team can now either approve or discard this work item from their Intake queue.

how_it_works.title: How it works?
how_it_works.heading: This is an Intake form.
how_it_works.description: Intake is a Plane feature that lets project admins and managers get work items from outside into their projects.

steps.step_1: This short form lets you create a new work item in a Plane project.
steps.step_2: When you submit this form, a new work item is created in that project's Intake.
steps.step_3: Someone from that project or team will review this.
steps.step_4: If they approve it, this work item will move to the project's queue of work. Otherwise, it will be rejected.
steps.step_5: To check for the status of that work item, get in touch with the project's manager, admin, or whoever sent you the link to this page.

settings.heading: Recurring work items
settings.description: Set your repeatable work once, and we’ll take care of the repeats. You’ll see everything right here when it’s time.

create_button.label: Create recurring work item
create_button.no_permission: Contact your project admin to create recurring work items

upgrade.title: Your work, on autopilot
upgrade.description: Set it once. We’ll bring it back when it’s due. Upgrade to Business to make recurring work feel effortless.

no_templates.button: Create your first recurring work item

success.title: Recurring work item created
success.message: {name}, the recurring work item, is now available for your workspace.

error.title: We couldn't create that recurring work item this time.
error.message: Try saving your details again or copy them over to a new recurring work item, preferably in another tab.

success.title: Recurring work item changed
success.message: {name}, the recurring work item, was changed.

error.title: We couldn't save changes to this recurring work item.
error.message: Try saving your details again or come back to this recurring work item later. If there's trouble still, reach out to us.

success.title: Recurring work item deleted
success.message: {name}, the recurring work item, has now been deleted from your workspace.

error.title: We couldn't delete that recurring work item this.
error.message: Try deleting it again or come back to it later. If you can't delete it then, reach out to us.

description.prefix: Are you sure you want to delete recurring work item-
description.suffix: ? All of the data related to the recurring work item will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.

trigger.label: Trigger
trigger.input_label: What’s the trigger for this automation?

validation.delete_only_action: Disable the automation before deleting its only action.

enable.alert: Hit 'Enable' whenever your automation is complete. Once enabled, the automation will be ready to run.

validation.required: Automation must have a trigger and at least one action to be enabled.

error.title: Error!
error.message: Automation enable failed.

error.title: Error!
error.message: Automation disable failed.

upgrade.title: Automations
upgrade.description: Automations are a way to automate tasks in your project.
upgrade.sub_description: Get 80% of your admin time back when you use Automations.
